# resp.js


### install

```npm install node-api-resp --save```


```js
var resp = require('node-api-resp');
var data = {
	userMessage: 'xxxx',
	userCode: 'rrrr',
};
var err = resp.error('this is error msg', data, 400, 'ERROR_USER');
var ok = resp.response('this is SUCCESS msg', data, 200);

console.log(err);
console.log(ok);
```
